history.content:
Please select the Vmware,because there are too bugs in vb.

For instance,the vb can't load the "mooc-os-2015.vdi".

Even in its certain version,I can't open it after installation...

Of course,I tried to find the deep reason via log,I failed.Because I meeted many problems like Problem-Recursion.I failed to use vb.

so,later,I selected another famous virtual machine software-VMware.Although its physique is enough enormous,but it's steady.

In this part,I noted a tip for you.Because the package to which Mr.Chen's github provided is "mooc-os-2015.vdi",it's in configuration state,but it just used in VirtualBox.Certainly,we can download .ios file of ubuntu from internet ,then do it by yourself.I finded that the .vdi file can used in VMware.Here is the specify:How to transfer the virtual machine between the VirtualBox and VMware

So,the problem about installation of coding situation is solved.Here is the snapshot.Aha~~
history.subject: If you have trouble in using VirtualBox...
